sense.def:
A framework
je ogrodje, ki oblikuje oporo ali okvir nečemu.

seg.quote: There are nine large panels set in a richly carved framework.

sense.def:
A framework
je tudi zbirka pravil, zamisli ali prepričanj; z njihovo pomočjo se odločimo, kako naj se vedemo.

seg.quote: They were able to absorb these changes within the framework of traditional institutions and ideas.
